title: T206 cards for sale: Frill, Hunter, Beaumont, Young
author: thehoodedcoder

posts.post_title: T206 cards for sale: Frill, Hunter, Beaumont, Young
posts.post_content:
Up for grabs is a range of different graded T206's

Hunter       PSA 2    - 40.00
Frill            PSA 3    - 65.00
Beaumont  PSA 4    - 90.00
Young        SGC 60 - 2200.00 (Back is left to right centered, Piedmont 150)

Paypal Gift, Check or Money Order. Check/Money Order preferred for avoiding taxes at end of year but not a requirement.

No back scan at the moment as I am not home. Better scans can be put on my site if you are interested.

Kevin

posts.post_title: T206 cards for sale: Frill, Hunter, Beaumont, Young
posts.post_content:
Hi Kevin,

Great cards here, that Cy Young is a show.  Would love to see a bigger scan of it.

Couldnt quite read on the other 3 PSA graded cards, are all Piedmont backs?

Rick.

I just remembered that i had them on my site. Only one I am missing is the Beaumont back and Young back, but that was an upgrade. Both are P150 back. 

Back is immaculate centered. I actually hate when people up sell their cards as the next highest grade but it is a real nice looking 4 if I recall correctly. I have a Beaumont PSA 5 in my back run so I'm not absolutely certian.

[URL="http://thehoodedcoder.com/images/displayimage-250.html&fullsize=1"]Cy Young Portrait SGC 60[/URL]

[URL="http://thehoodedcoder.com/images/thumbnails-12.html"]Other cards[/URL]


Kevin

Young was moved to ebay with a 2k BIN price and .99 starting price on the auction. Willing to end early if anyone is still interested.

Kevin
